messages.message: Hey everyone, I'm excited to be a part of this forum!
Same here! What do you all think about the new web app for suggesting songs?
I think it's a great idea. We should make sure to have a feature that allows users to search for songs by genre.
I agree with Helen. We should also have a way for users to see which songs are most popular.
We should also allow band members to mark songs they've already played, so users can see what's been played recently.
I agree with Olivia. It would also be great to have a discussion thread for each song suggestion.
What about a feature that allows users to upvote or downvote song suggestions?
I think that's a great idea, Grace. It would give users a way to voice their opinions.
We should also have a feature that allows band members to rate song suggestions based on difficulty or style.
That's a good point, Maggie. We should also have a way for users to see which band members like or dislike a particular song suggestion.
Maybe we can also have a section for users to submit their own original songs!
I like that idea, Olivia. It would be a great way for users to showcase their own talent.
We should also have a way for users to follow their favorite band members and see what they've been up to.
That's a great idea, David. We should also allow users to send messages to their favorite band members.
What about a feature that allows users to create playlists of their favorite songs?
I like that idea, Isaac. It would give users a way to save their favorite songs in one place.
Hey everyone, I'm new here. Just wanted to say hi!
Hello!  I just got in from the field.  What's up everyone???
